posts.author: Alex Tabarrok
posts.title: The Irony of Hillary Clinton’s Data Analytics
posts.body: Barack Obama’s campaign adopted data but Hillary Clinton’s campaign has been molded by data from birth.

comments.author: Todd
comments.text: Clinton got out data-ed and out organized in 2008 by Obama. She seems at least to learn over time, and apply the lessons learned to the real world.

replies.author: The Other Jim
replies.text: No, she lost because (1) she is thoroughly detested person and (2) the DNC decided Obama should therefore win.
